channel.title: Server Request
channel.description:
[s]Can someone please make me a server? I am using the request template by MMcgrady1.
Can you please make me an account on this server? I want to have a gold crown and I want YOU to have a gold crown also. The reason is i have MAc OS X and the Java thing wont downlaod on my comp.Thanks
Can you make some cool stuff?
Starting Equipment Full dragon and full barrows. Abby wip. rune pick. 50m (if you can make)
Starting Stats 99 hp 500 combat if you can make, but if not 126 combat Everything else 99
Lvling type Fast
Features Dragon smithing NO nulls both magic types work w/o runes Perfect ring (admins and mods only) gives 10k stat bonus to all stats (range def, melee def, etc.) Nobody can PK admins Admins cannot lose itmes when dieing
NPCs Area Greater Demons (5 please) GDZ (wild) KBD a random dungeon Jad (3 please) Mage Arena (wild) (ALL) barrows brothers Varrock Central
Commands Effect ::prayer gives 1M ourg bones to raise prayer ::range teles u to range guild to range range (hit targets to raise it) ::dragon Gives full dragon with cooking gauntlets, rune boots, fury, and whip ::jad telepots u to Jad ::barrows gives u all barrows ::mime gives u full mime ::rune gives u full rune ::archer gives u karils top and bottom, robin hood set, crystal bow, and fury ::stone gives u (working) ring of stone ::cw teleports u to Castle Wars ::da teleports u to Duel Arena ::gdz teleports u to Greater Demons (wild) ::food gives u 1k Manta Rays ::home teleports u to Varrock (East Bank) ::legends gives legends cape, desert boots, and cooking gauntlets ::king gives full gilded ::switch Switches u to Ancients and vice versa ::bars gives rune and gold bars to smith (gold bars make dragon) ::KBD teleports u to a dungeon with the King Black Dragon ::maxme (Admin and mod only) gives u max lvl on all stats (500 on all CMB stats, 99 on non-cmb stats)
Shops NPC Owners Items Barrows Outlets Horvik All barrows sets (1000 of each set in stock) Magic Outlet Zaff Full Infinity, full ghostly robes, ALL mystic full sets, full enchanted, ALL 3 mage books, and ancient staff Dragon Outlet Vanaka Full dragon, dds, dscimmy, dragon spear (kp), dlong, dragon battleax, and dragon 2H Amulet Outlet Betty Fury, glory, str ammy, def ammy, and magic ammy Range Outlet Brian Arrow set (Rune-Bronze) (10,000 of each arrow), full karils, bolt racks, full blk d hide, crystal bow, mage shortbow, and robin hood set.
Rare Outlet Santa Phat set, mask set, santa, half wine, easter, sythe, pumkins pumpkin, and disk of returning Rune Outlet Aubury Fires, waters, airs, earths, chaos, deaths, laws, cosmic, souls, bloods and nature runes. (10k of each rune in stock) Melee Outlet Lowe Full rune, ALL rune trimmed armors, ALL god capes, and whip General Outlet Wizard Mizgog Rune boots, ALL gloves, ALL boots, and legends cape [/s]

item.title: Server Request
item.dc:creator: @infestor1 infestor1
item.description:
@infestor1 wrote:

[s]Can someone please make me a server? I am using the request template by MMcgrady1.

Can you please make me an account on this server? I want to have a gold crown and I want YOU to have a gold crown also. The reason is i have MAc OS X and the Java thing wont downlaod on my comp.Thanks

Can you make some cool stuff?

Starting Equipment
Full dragon and full barrows. Abby wip. rune pick. 50m (if you can make)

Starting Stats
99 hp
500 combat if you can make, but if not 126 combat
Everything else 99

Lvling type
Fast

Features
Dragon smithing
NO nulls
both magic types work w/o runes
Perfect ring (admins and mods only) gives 10k stat bonus to all stats (range def, melee def, etc.)
Nobody can PK admins
Admins cannot lose itmes when dieing

NPCs Area
Greater Demons (5 please) GDZ (wild)
KBD a random dungeon
Jad (3 please) Mage Arena (wild)
(ALL) barrows brothers Varrock Central

Commands Effect
::prayer gives 1M ourg bones to raise prayer
::range teles u to range guild to range range (hit targets to raise it)
::dragon Gives full dragon with cooking gauntlets, rune boots, fury, and whip
::jad telepots u to Jad
::barrows gives u all barrows
::mime gives u full mime
::rune gives u full rune
::archer gives u karils top and bottom, robin hood set, crystal bow, and fury
::stone gives u (working) ring of stone
::cw teleports u to Castle Wars
::da teleports u to Duel Arena
::gdz teleports u to Greater Demons (wild)
::food gives u 1k Manta Rays
::home teleports u to Varrock (East Bank)
::legends gives legends cape, desert boots, and cooking gauntlets
::king gives full gilded
::switch Switches u to Ancients and vice versa
::bars gives rune and gold bars to smith (gold bars make dragon)
::KBD teleports u to a dungeon with the King Black Dragon
::maxme (Admin and mod only) gives u max lvl on all stats (500 on all CMB stats, 99 on non-cmb stats)

Shops NPC Owners Items
Barrows Outlets Horvik All barrows sets (1000 of each set in stock)
Magic Outlet Zaff Full Infinity, full ghostly robes, ALL mystic
full sets, full enchanted, ALL 3 mage books,
and ancient staff
Dragon Outlet Vanaka Full dragon, dds, dscimmy, dragon spear (kp),
dlong, dragon battleax, and dragon 2H
Amulet Outlet Betty Fury, glory, str ammy, def ammy, and magic ammy
Range Outlet Brian Arrow set (Rune-Bronze) (10,000 of each
arrow), full karils, bolt racks, full blk d hide, crystal
bow, mage shortbow, and robin hood set.

Rare Outlet Santa Phat set, mask set, santa, half wine, easter, sythe, pumkins
pumpkin, and disk of returning
Rune Outlet Aubury Fires, waters, airs, earths, chaos, deaths, laws, cosmic, souls, bloods
and nature runes. (10k of each rune in stock)
Melee Outlet Lowe Full rune, ALL rune trimmed armors, ALL god
capes, and whip
General Outlet Wizard Mizgog Rune boots, ALL gloves, ALL boots, and legends cape
[/s]

Read full topic
